props.name: value
props.description: An array of treenodes.

props.name: dataKey
props.description: Name of the field that uniquely identifies the a record in the data.

props.name: expandedKeys
props.description: A map of keys to represent the state of the tree expansion state in controlled mode.

props.name: selectionKeys
props.description: A map of keys to control the selection state.

props.name: selectionMode
props.description: Defines the selection mode.

props.name: metaKeySelection
props.description:
Defines how multiple items can be selected, when true metaKey needs to be pressed to select or unselect an item and when set to false selection of each item can be toggled individually.
On touch enabled devices, metaKeySelection is turned off automatically.

props.name: contextMenu
props.description: Enables context menu integration.

props.name: contextMenuSelection
props.description: Selected row instance with the ContextMenu.

props.name: rows
props.description: Number of rows to display per page.

props.name: first
props.description: Index of the first row to be displayed.

props.name: totalRecords
props.description: Number of total records, defaults to length of value when not defined.

props.name: paginator
props.description: When specified as true, enables the pagination.

props.name: paginatorPosition
props.description: Position of the paginator, options are 'top','bottom' or 'both'.

props.name: alwaysShowPaginator
props.description: Whether to show it even there is only one page.

props.name: paginatorTemplate
props.default: FirstPageLink PrevPageLink PageLinks NextPageLink LastPageLink RowsPerPageDropdown
props.description:
Template of the paginator. It can be customized using the template property using the predefined keys. Here are the available elements that can be placed inside a paginator in any order.

- FirstPageLink
- PrevPageLink
- PageLinks
- NextPageLink
- LastPageLink
- RowsPerPageDropdown
- JumpToPageDropdown
- JumpToPageInput
- CurrentPageReport

props.name: pageLinkSize
props.description: Number of page links to display.

props.name: rowsPerPageOptions
props.description: Array of integer values to display inside rows per page dropdown.

props.name: currentPageReportTemplate
lazy
props.description: Defines if data is loaded and interacted with in lazy manner.

props.name: loading
props.description: Displays a loader to indicate data load is in progress.

props.name: loadingIcon
props.description: The icon to show while indicating data load is in progress.

props.name: loadingMode
props.description: Loading mode display.

props.name: rowHover
props.description: When enabled, background of the rows change on hover.

props.name: autoLayout
props.description: Whether the cell widths scale according to their content or not.

props.name: sortField
props.description: Property name or a getter function of a row data used for sorting by default.

props.name: sortOrder
props.description: Order to sort the data by default.

props.name: defaultSortOrder
props.description: Default sort order of an unsorted column.

props.name: multiSortMeta
props.description: An array of SortMeta objects to sort the data by default in multiple sort mode.

props.name: sortMode
props.description: Defines whether sorting works on single column or on multiple columns.

props.name: removableSort
props.description: When enabled, columns can have an un-sorted state.

props.name: filters
props.description: Filters object with key-value pairs to define the filters.

props.name: filterMode
props.description: Mode for filtering.

props.name: filterLocale
props.description: Locale to use in filtering. The default locale is the host environment's current locale.

props.name: resizableColumns
props.description: When enabled, columns can be resized using drag and drop.

props.name: columnResizeMode
props.description: Defines whether the overall table width should change on column resize.

props.name: indentation
props.description: Indentation factor as rem value for children nodes.

props.name: showGridlines
props.description: Whether to show grid lines between cells.

props.name: scrollable
props.description: When specified, enables horizontal and/or vertical scrolling.

props.name: scrollHeight
props.description: Height of the scroll viewport in fixed pixels or the 'flex' keyword for a dynamic size.

props.name: size
props.description: Defines the size of the table.

props.name: tableStyle
props.description: Inline style of the table element.

props.name: tableClass
props.description: Style class of the table element.

props.name: tableProps
props.description: Props to pass to the table element.

props.name: dt
props.description: It generates scoped CSS variables using design tokens for the component.

props.name: pt
props.description: Used to pass attributes to DOM elements inside the component.

props.name: ptOptions
props.description: Used to configure passthrough(pt) options of the component.

props.name: unstyled
props.description: When enabled, it removes component related styles in the core.

slots.name: paginatorfirstpagelinkicon

parameters.name: scope

slots.description: Custom paginator first page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatorprevpagelinkicon

parameters.name: scope

slots.description: Custom paginator previous page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatornextpagelinkicon

parameters.name: scope

slots.description: Custom paginator next page link icon template.

slots.name: paginatorlastpagelinkicon

parameters.name: scope

slots.description: Custom paginator last page link icon template.

parameters.name: scope
scope

emits.name: update:expandedKeys
emits.description: Emitted when the expanded keys change.

emits.name: update:selectionKeys
emits.description: Emitted when the selection keys change.

emits.name: page
emits.description: Callback to invoke on pagination. Sort and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

emits.name: sort
emits.description: Callback to invoke on sort. Page and Filter information is also available for lazy loading implementation.

emits.name: filter
emits.description: Event to emit after filtering, not triggered in lazy mode.

emits.name: node-select
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is selected.

emits.name: node-unselect
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is unselected.

emits.name: node-expand
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is expanded.

emits.name: node-collapse
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a node is collapsed.

emits.name: column-resize-end
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a column is resized.

emits.name: row-contextmenu
emits.description: Callback to invoke when a row is selected with a ContextMenu.

template:
<TreeTable :value="nodes" tableStyle="min-width: 50rem">
    <Column field="name" header="Name" expander style="width: 34%"></Column>
    <Column field="size" header="Size" style="width: 33%"></Column>
    <Column field="type" header="Type" style="width: 33%"></Column>
</TreeTable>
